__e: If he is, he doesn't know that we know he lied about his location.
Why did they tell me exactly where he is right now and when he's leaving?
I don't have his location, but I have his personal phone number.
Just give me the location of my box and then I go away.
Give up your people's location, And maybe you'll get to see them again.
Now I have the address of the planet he went to and we can go there.
Or you just tell us the location of one man.
We'll have to ascertain the whereabouts - of each and every one.
And I know that up here you have the location of 5 millions in gold which I want back.
I need directions and a few of your guys to help, OK?
I'll tell you exact location, and things to do.
I gave him the car, the location, and he went on his way... he was here maybe 20 minutes tops.
'I can tell you where it is, its exact location,' but I think I'd better not.
I shall call you with the exact location, and you will have precisely five minutes to travel to me with the machine and the key.
Then we must hope that is the location of the weapon.
The clue to the location of the control room must be around here somewhere.
He knew nothing about a secret location regarding Earth.
